item.title: MICT Inc 10-K
item.description: MICT Inc, which is in the Electronic Components & Accessories [3670] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 17, 2022 had 50117 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: insurance - 553 instances company - 491 instances business - 488 instances may - 466 instances mict - 441 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
